name: (MUSH)ROOM FOR TWO
description:
Try to get to the surface of the cave. Collecting mushrooms and serving them to the combatants will reduce the conflict above, and make your ascent easier...

WSD TO MOVE.
MOUSE 1 TO PLACE MIRROR. MOUSE 1 ALSO FLIPS MIRROR.
MOUSE 2 TO REMOVE MIRROR.

@msevenrk code
@theroguez art and story
@sagemustdie sound

made in 72 hours for mashupjam 2
